summary.description: uORF-Tools-Workflow for the determination of translation-regulatory upstream open reading frames | uORF-Tools are a workflow and a collection of tools for the analysis of 'Upstream Open Reading Frames' (short uORFs) | uORF-Tools are a workflow and a collection of tools for the analysis of 'upstream Open Reading Frames' (short uORFs). The workflow is based on the workflow management system snakemake and handles installation of all dependencies, as well as all processings steps. The source code of uORF-Tools is open source and available under the GPL-3 License. Installation is described below, for usage please refer to the Userguide
